connector.description: Send a query to an Apache Cassandra cluster table.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectio.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectio.description: The hostname(s) for the Cassandra server(s). Use a comma to separate multiple hostnames. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectio.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.connectio.description: The port number(s) of the cassandra server(s). Use a comma to separate multiple port numbers. Example: 9042

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.keyspace.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.keyspace
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.keyspace.description: The keyspace to use. Example: customers

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username.description: The username for accessing a secured Cassandra cluster.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password.description: The password for accessing a secured Cassandra cluster.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStr.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStrategy
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStr.description: The strategy to convert the result set of the query.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query.description: The query to execute against the Cassandra cluster table.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.extraType.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.extraTypeCodecs
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.extraType.description: To use a specific comma separated list of Extra Type codecs.
